trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
There were no other sightings in Fort Collins on or around February 18th 2007
Summary: ufo over horsetooth resevoir / wrist canyon road, fort collins, co
divs: Sighting Detailsas we were returning home from Gateway park we parked at the intersection of highways 14 and 287 and watched what we first thought to be a plane. we then noticed it wasn't moving towards or away from us, it seemed to hover over the first range just north of fort collins and eventually drifted a bit north (just left of the 'Bellvue dome'? huge rift next to 287 and 14). it appeared in the classic spherical shape and emitted a firey orange color. we were pretty excited at this point and decided to chase it, and we watched as it blinked out - more of a fade, really. either way, we made our way over to Horsetooth Resevoir road, and saw what appeared to be the same object drfting along the eastern side of Resevoir Ridge. crazyness
